00030    class CosineSqAngle : public ParamComposite 
00031    {

00079 
00086       double energy(double cosTheta, int type) const;
00087  
00099       void force(const Vector& R1, const Vector& R2,
00100                        Vector& F1, Vector& F2, int type) const;
00101

00110

00115  
00116    private:
00117    
00119       static const int MaxNAngleType = 4;
00120    
00121       double kappa_[MaxNAngleType];      
00122       double theta0_[MaxNAngleType];     
00123       double cosTheta0_[MaxNAngleType];  
00124       int    nAngleType_;

00128    // Inline method definitions
00129    
00130    /* 
00131    * Return angle energy.
00132    */
00133    inline double CosineSqAngle::energy(double cosTheta, int type) const
00134    {
00135       return ( kappa_[type]
00136               *(cosTheta-cosTheta0_[type])
00137               *(cosTheta-cosTheta0_[type])*0.5 );
00138    }
00139 
00140    /* 
00141    * Return:
00142    *    F1 = d energy / d(R1)
00143    *    F2 = d energy / d(R2)
00144    * for use in MD and stress calculation.
00145    */
00146    inline
00147    void CosineSqAngle::force(const Vector& R1, const Vector& R2,
00148                    Vector& F1, Vector& F2, int type) const
00149    {
00150       Vector u1 = R1;
00151       Vector u2 = R2;
00152       double r1 = R1.abs();
00153       double r2 = R2.abs();
00154       double cosTheta;
00155      
00156       u1 /= r1;
00157       u2 /= r2;
00158       cosTheta = u1.dot(u2);
00159 
00160       F1.multiply(u1, cosTheta);
00161       F1 -= u2;
00162       F1 *= kappa_[type]/r1*(cosTheta0_[type]-cosTheta);
00163 
00164       F2.multiply(u2, cosTheta);
00165       F2 -= u1;
00166       F2 *= kappa_[type]/r2*(cosTheta0_[type]-cosTheta);
00167    }
00168   
00169 }
00170
